products.name: Premium Wireless Headphones
products.descriptionSummary: High-quality wireless headphones with noise cancellation
products.description: Experience premium sound quality with these wireless headphones featuring advanced noise cancellation technology, 30-hour battery life, and comfortable over-ear design. Perfect for music enthusiasts and professionals alike.

products.name: Smart Fitness Watch
products.descriptionSummary: Advanced fitness tracking with heart rate monitoring
products.description: Stay on top of your health with this smart fitness watch. Features include 24/7 heart rate monitoring, sleep tracking, 20+ exercise modes, GPS tracking, and a vibrant AMOLED display. Water-resistant up to 50m.

products.name: Ergonomic Office Chair
products.descriptionSummary: Comfortable ergonomic chair with lumbar support
products.description: Work in comfort with this ergonomic office chair. Features include adjustable height, tilt, and armrests, breathable mesh back, premium lumbar support, and smooth-rolling casters. Designed for long hours of comfortable seating.

products.name: Mechanical Gaming Keyboard
products.descriptionSummary: RGB mechanical keyboard with customizable switches
products.description: Enhance your gaming experience with this premium mechanical keyboard. Features include RGB backlighting, N-key rollover, customizable mechanical switches, dedicated media controls, and a durable aluminum frame. Includes wrist rest for extended comfort.

products.name: Professional DSLR Camera
products.description: High-end digital camera for professional photography. Features include 45.7 megapixel full-frame sensor, 4K video recording, advanced autofocus system, and weather-sealed body.

products.name: Modern Coffee Table
products.descriptionSummary: Contemporary coffee table with hidden storage
products.description: Stylish coffee table with storage space. Features a lift-top design, hidden compartment, and durable wood construction with a modern finish.

products.name: Bestseller Book Collection
products.description: Collection of top 5 bestselling novels from renowned authors. Includes hardcover editions with premium binding and exclusive bonus content.

products.name: Premium Yoga Mat
products.description: Non-slip yoga mat with carrying strap. Features eco-friendly materials, extra thickness for comfort, and excellent grip for all types of yoga practices.

products.name: Designer Handbag
products.descriptionSummary: Luxury leather handbag with elegant design
products.description: Luxury leather handbag with gold details. Crafted from premium Italian leather with sophisticated gold hardware and multiple compartments.

products.name: Smart Coffee Maker
products.description: WiFi-enabled coffee maker with scheduling. Control with your smartphone, set brewing schedules, and enjoy customizable brewing options.

products.name: Gaming Console
products.description: Next-gen gaming console with 4K support. Features ray tracing, fast loading times, and backward compatibility with previous generation games.

products.name: Luxury Skincare Set
products.description: Premium skincare collection with natural ingredients. Includes cleanser, toner, serum, and moisturizer made with organic ingredients.

products.name: Wireless Gaming Mouse
products.description: High-precision wireless gaming mouse with customizable buttons, advanced optical sensor, and long battery life.

products.name: Adjustable Dumbbell Set
products.description: Space-saving adjustable weight set with quick weight adjustment mechanism. Perfect for home gyms and versatile workouts.

products.name: Smart LED TV
products.description: 55-inch 4K Smart LED TV with HDR support. Features AI-powered upscaling, smart home integration, and multiple streaming apps built-in.

products.name: Minimalist Watch
products.description: Elegant minimalist design watch with premium materials. Features sapphire crystal, Swiss movement, and genuine leather strap.
